You can cast {@spell summon shadowspawn|tce} at the level of your Primal Magic slots, without expending a spell slot or material components. Once you cast summon shadowspawn this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it in this way again.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit of Challenge
entries: Cet esprit contraint vos ennemis à se lever et à se battre contre vous. Lorsque vous touchez une créature avec une attaque de cette arme, elle a un désavantage sur toutes les attaques qu'elle effectue contre des créatures autres que vous jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit of Draining
entries: Cet esprit siphonne la force vitale d'autres créatures pour vous restaurer. Une fois par tour, lorsque vous touchez une créature avec cette arme, vous pouvez faire en sorte que les dégâts de l'attaque soient nécrotiques, et vous gagnez des points de vie temporaires égaux à votre modificateur de Sagesse.

optionalfeature.name: Spirit of Might
entries: Cet esprit tire le plein potentiel de votre corps. Lorsque vous maniez cette arme, vous bénéficiez d'un bonus aux tests de Force et aux jets de sauvegarde égal à votre modificateur de Sagesse.
De plus, vous avez l'avantage sur les jets d'attaque avec cette arme contre toute créature qui est agrippée par vous.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Air
entries: This mastery grants you the following benefits:

items: You gain resistance to thunder damage.
Your {@classFeature Totemic Assault|Shaman|LLSH|1} deals thunder damage in place of necrotic damage, and on a failed save, a Large or smaller creature is moved 5 feet in a direction of your choice.

entries: You gain the Spirituality Spells from the table below. When you gain a level in this class, you can replace one spell from this feature with another spell of the same level from any spell list that deals only the damage type of its element.
Alternatively, you can replace the spell with another spell of a similar elemental theme at the discretion of your DM.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Earth
entries: This mastery grants you the following benefits:

items: You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage.

Your {@classFeature Totemic Assault|Shaman|LLSH|1} deals magical bludgeoning damage in place of necrotic damage, and on a failed save, a Large or smaller creature is knocked {@condition prone} in its space.

entries: You gain the Spirituality Spells from the table below. When you gain a level in this class, you can replace one spell from this feature with another spell of the same level from any spell list that deals only the damage type of its element.
Alternatively, you can replace the spell with another spell of a similar elemental theme at the discretion of your DM.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Fire
entries: This mastery grants you the following benefits:

items: You gain resistance to fire damage.

Your {@classFeature Totemic Assault|Shaman|LLSH|1} deals fire damage in place of necrotic damage, and the damage dice you roll for Totemic Assault become {@dice d12}s (instead of the normal {@dice d8}s).

entries: You gain the Spirituality Spells from the table below. When you gain a level in this class, you can replace one spell from this feature with another spell of the same level from any spell list that deals only the damage type of its element.
Alternatively, you can replace the spell with another spell of a similar elemental theme at the discretion of your DM.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Water
entries: This mastery grants you the following benefits:

items: You gain resistance to cold damage.
Your {@classFeature Totemic Assault|Shaman|LLSH|1} deals cold damage in place of necrotic damage, and when you use Totemic Assault you can target two creatures that are within 5 feet of each other.

entries: You gain the Spirituality Spells from the table below. When you gain a level in this class, you can replace one spell from this feature with another spell of the same level from any spell list that deals only the damage type of its element.
Alternatively, you can replace the spell with another spell of a similar elemental theme at the discretion of your DM.

optionalfeature.name: Elementalist Spell
entries: You can cast one Elementalist Spell at the level of your Primal Magic spell slots, without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you must finish a long rest before you can cast an Elementalist spell in this way again. If you chose this feature previously you can cast two spells in this way.

1.choose: subclass=shaman: elementalist (llsh:e), fire;shaman: elementalist (llsh:e), water;shaman: elementalist (llsh:e), air;shaman: elementalist (llsh:e), earth

optionalfeature.name: Air Ascension
entries: You learn the spell {@spell Investiture of Wind|xge}. The spell counts as a Shaman spell for you, but does not count against your number of Spells Known. Once per long rest, you can cast it without expending a spell slot.

optionalfeature.name: Earth Ascension
entries: You learn the spell {@spell Investiture of Stone|xge}. The spell counts as a Shaman spell for you, but does not count against your number of Spells Known. Once per long rest, you can cast it without expending a spell slot.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Ascension
entries: You learn the spell {@spell Investiture of Flame|xge}. The spell counts as a Shaman spell for you, but does not count against your number of Spells Known. Once per long rest, you can cast it without expending a spell slot.

optionalfeature.name: Water Ascension
entries: You learn the spell {@spell Investiture of Ice|xge}. The spell counts as a Shaman spell for you, but does not count against your number of Spells Known. Once per long rest, you can cast it without expending a spell slot.

trait.name: Hit Dice
entries: La Grande Bête a un nombre total de dés de points de vie d10 égal à votre niveau de chaman. Elle bénéficie également de tous les avantages normaux des repos courts et longs.

trait.name: Primal Fury
entries: Lorsque la Grande Bête effectue un test de capacité ou un jet de sauvegarde qui utilise la Force, la Dextérité ou la Constitution, elle peut ajouter votre PB au jet.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +4 plus PB pour toucher, portée de 5 ft, une cible. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 4} dégâts perforants.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} +4 plus PB pour toucher, portée de 1,5 m, une cible. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 4} dégâts d'arme blanche.

monster.name: Giest
languages: understands the languages you speak, but can't speak

trait.name: Conduit
entries: When you cast a Shaman spell, you can choose for it to originate from you or the Giest.

trait.name: Ghastly Glide
entries: Though the Giest has a fly speed, it can only fly a maximum of 10 feet above a surface

trait.name: Totemic Bond
entries: You add your PB to any ability check or saving throw the Giest makes.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3} necrotic damage. On hit, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your Totemic save DC or be frightened of the Giest until the end of its next turn.

monster.name: Spirit Dragon
languages: understands the languages you speak, but the Spirit Dragon can only speak Draconic

trait.name: Serpentine Body
entries: When the Spirit Dragon makes an ability check or saving throw that uses Dexterity, it can add your Wisdom modifier to the result.

action.name: Spectral Slash
entries: your Shaman spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 4 + PB} slashing + {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage.

action.name: Spirit Breath
entries: The Spirit Dragon can expend a Primal Magic spell slot to exhale pure spiritual energy in a 30 ft. cone, forcing creatures in that area to make a Dexterity saving throw. They take necrotic damage equal to twice the damage of your Totemic Assault on a failed save, and half as much on a success.
